product_name: Moving Comfort Hot Shot Tank Top - Women's
long_description: Ideal for layering over a sports bra, the women's Moving Comfort Hot Shot Tank Top features soft performance fabric that keeps you comfortable during long runs in warm weather. Polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. The Moving Comfort Hot Shot Tank Top offers a next-to-skin fit. Sweetheart neckline and mesh criss-cross fabric panels across body.
short_description: Ideal for layering over a sports bra, the women's Moving Comfort Hot Shot Tank Top features soft performance fabric that keeps you comfortable during long runs in warm weather.
